sentences.en: The concept of genius and of gifts has become part of our folk culture, and attitudes are ambivalent towards them.
sentences.cn: 天才和天赋的概念已经成为我们民间文化的一部分，人们对它们的态度是矛盾的。

sentences.en: He has an ambivalent attitude towards her.
sentences.cn: 他对她怀着矛盾的心情。

sentences.en: She remained ambivalent about her marriage.
sentences.cn: 她对她的婚姻保持暧昧的态度。
